name: Survival Math
description:
Do you want to play a fun game full of unique mechanics and which will help you to boost your math learning fast and easy? Survival Math is here!

you can move your Spaceship by drag and drop your finger! you must gathering correct answers in spheres. We have 4 operators( + - × ÷ ), The Questions are shown at the top of the page.

🛒Game Shop 

you can buy beautiful Skies and powerful Spaceships with game coin in shop!

🏅Leader board

Survival math has Global Leader board! you can see your information and your rank in world!

📺Follow us for the latest news:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/mfaxyz/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5IZqZ27SA21Te5uvAm5weA

⭐If you like this app, please give us 5 Stars!

Free to download and play, but contains 3rd party advertising.
